name: Trustply
description:
• Developed SPA applications using Angular framework to increase the performance.
  • Created responsive and functional user interfaces with Html, CSS and Bootstrap, that allowed cross-platform accessibility to the website on all mediums and screen sizes.
  • Collaborated with back-end developers, designers and QA testers to drive Innovation and maximize conversions by 40%.
  • Translated visual designs to simple and clean codes.

name: News Website
description:
• Created a responsive landing page for a news website from the desired photoshop design using Html, CSS and JavaScript.
  • Built website pages in clean and optimum way to maintain readability and prevent repetitive coding.

name: Myket
description:
• Developed MVC architectural code in Angular 8 with over 80% accordance to the industry and company standards.
  • Added new features in innovating modules format, for instance created a ticketing system full frontend which improved both users and support team satisfaction by 45%.
  • Built API following restful standards to allow users to submit information by storing data in the database.
  • Developed user interfaces with Angular 8 Framework, HTML5 and CSS3 which improved user satisfaction by 45%.
  • Ensured the quality and technical feasibility of UI and UX designs.

name: Portfolio website
description:
• Designed the portfolio website in new modern user-friendly techniques.
  • Developed the portfolio website as a Single-page Application, regarding clean code principles.
